comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Have fun Steve. No, forget that; you're doing intervals today... The 2nd wave - we non-interval-bashing slackers - of Frenz could take off from Telecom at 12:10. Same destination (Flag), different pain level.

comments.author: Brian
comments.body: As a 3rd option, I'm heading out east to do some flat spinning from the Stadium at noon. Brian
